parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerId
parameters.description: The ID of the ELB instance.

parameters.name: Proto
parameters.description: The network protocol, such as tcp or udp.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query.

parameters.name: VPort
parameters.description: The virtual IP address (VIP) port of the ELB instance.
